properties.title: Java date and time API - Hibernate support - User Guide
properties.author: Stephen Colebourne

section.name: Introduction
section.p: Joda-Time Hibernate support provides classes to persist Joda-Time based date and time objects to a database using Hibernate.

subsection.name: Documentation
subsection.p: It is fairly easy to use this package in your Hibernate environment. There are two main options for the configuration - the hibernate mapping file or annotations.
